languages.text: All weapons in a huge area gain additional effects: Allies' Weapons: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced by half for Tech-Priest's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} rounds. Enemies suffer a −(2 × INT bonus)% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for (1 + INT bonus) rounds. Enemies' Weapons: recoil is increased by half for Tech-Priest's INT bonus rounds. Allies gain +(2 × INT bonus)% increased dodge for (1 + INT bonus) rounds.
languages.original_text: Все оружие в обширной области получает дополнительные эффекты: Оружие союзников: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}отдача{/g} уменьшается вдвое на {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}ИНТ{/g} техножреца раундов. Противники получают штраф −(2 × бонус ИНТ)% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} на (1 + бонус ИНТ) раундов. Оружие противников: отдача увеличивается в полтора раза на бонус ИНТ техножреца раундов. Союзники получают +(2 × бонус ИНТ)% к шансу уклонения на (1 + бонус ИНТ) раундов.

traits.locale_text: All weapons in a huge area gain additional effects: Ally weapons: the recoil is reduced by half for Tech-Priest's INT bonus rounds and the dodge chance of the targets is decreased by −(2 × INT bonus)% for (1 + INT bonus) rounds. Enemy weapons: the recoil is increased by half for Tech-Priest's INT bonus rounds and the dodge chance of the targets is increased by +(2 × INT bonus)% for (1 + INT bonus) rounds.

All weapons in a huge area gain additional effects: Allies' Weapons: recoil is reduced by half for Tech-Priest's INT bonus rounds. Enemies suffer a −(2 × INT bonus)% penalty to dodge for (1 + INT bonus) rounds. Enemies' Weapons: recoil is increased by half for Tech-Priest's INT bonus rounds. Allies gain +(2 × INT bonus)% increased dodge for (1 + INT bonus) rounds.

All weapons in a huge area gain additional effects: Allies' Weapons: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced by half for Tech-Priest's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} rounds. Enemies suffer a −(2 × INT bonus)% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for (1 + INT bonus) rounds. Enemies' Weapons: recoil is increased by half for Tech-Priest's INT bonus rounds. Allies gain +(2 × INT bonus)% increased dodge for (1 + INT bonus) rounds.

All weapons in a huge area gain additional effects: Allies' Weapons: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced by half for Tech-Priest's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} rounds. Enemies suffer a −(2 × INT bonus)% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for (1 + INT bonus) rounds. Enemies' Weapons: recoil is increased by half for Tech-Priest's INT bonus rounds. Allies gain +(2 × INT bonus)% increased dodge for (1 + INT bonus) rounds.

languages.text: 极大范围内所有角色的武器都会获得额外效果： 所有盟友的武器：{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}后坐力{/g}减半，持续轮数等同于技术神甫的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。所有敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}降低（2×智力加值）%，此减值效果持续轮数等同于（1+智力加值）。 所有敌人的武器：后坐力提高一半，持续轮数等同于技术神甫的智力加值。所有盟友的闪避提高（2×智力加值）%，持续轮数等同于（1+智力加值）。
languages.original_text: All weapons in a huge area gain additional effects: Allies' Weapons: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced by half for Tech-Priest's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} rounds. Enemies suffer a −(2 × INT bonus)% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for (1 + INT bonus) rounds. Enemies' Weapons: recoil is increased by half for Tech-Priest's INT bonus rounds. Allies gain +(2 × INT bonus)% increased dodge for (1 + INT bonus) rounds.

traits.locale_text: 极大范围内所有角色的武器都会获得额外效果： 所有盟友的武器：{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}后坐力{/g}减半，持续{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}数等同于技术祭司的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。所有敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}降低（2×智力加值）%，此{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}效果持续轮数等同于（1+智力加值）。 所有敌人的武器：后坐力提高一半，持续轮数等同于技术祭司的智力加值。所有盟友的闪避提高（2×智力加值）%，持续轮数等同于（1+智力加值）。

极大范围内所有角色的武器都会获得额外效果： 所有盟友的武器：{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}后坐力{/g}减半，持续{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}数等同于技术神甫的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。所有敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}降低（2×智力加值）%，此{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}效果持续轮数等同于（1+智力加值）。 所有敌人的武器：后坐力提高一半，持续轮数等同于技术神甫的智力加值。所有盟友的闪避提高（2×智力加值）%，持续轮数等同于（1+智力加值）。

languages.text: Todas las armas en un gran radio ganan efectos adicionales: Armas de aliados: se reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}retroceso{/g} a la mitad durante un número de asaltos igual a la {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} del tecnosacerdote. Los enemigos sufren una penalización del −(2 × bonificación por INT) % a su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} durante (1 + bonificación por INT) asaltos. Armas de enemigos: se aumenta el retroceso en la mitad durante un número de asaltos igual a la bonificación por INT del tecnosacerdote. Los aliados ganan +(2 × bonificación por INT) % más de esquiva durante (1 + bonificación por INT) asaltos.
languages.original_text: All weapons in a huge area gain additional effects: Allies' Weapons: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced by half for Tech-Priest's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} rounds. Enemies suffer a −(2 × INT bonus)% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for (1 + INT bonus) rounds. Enemies' Weapons: recoil is increased by half for Tech-Priest's INT bonus rounds. Allies gain +(2 × INT bonus)% increased dodge for (1 + INT bonus) rounds.

traits.locale_text: Todas las armas en un gran radio ganan efectos adicionales: Armas de aliados: se reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}retroceso{/g} a la mitad durante un número de {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g} igual a la {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} del tecnosacerdote. Los enemigos sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} del −(2 × bonificación por INT) % a su {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} durante (1 + bonificador por INT) asaltos. Armas de enemigos: se aumenta el retroceso en la mitad durante un número de asaltos igual a la bonificación por INT del tecnosacerdote. Los aliados ganan +(2 × bonificación por INT) % más de esquiva durante (1 + bonificación por INT) asaltos.

languages.text: 広範囲なエリアにあるすべての武器に追加エフェクトが付与される： 味方の武器： 技術司祭の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}反動{/g}が半減する。敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避率{/g}が（1 + INTボーナス）ラウンドの間、−（2 × INTボーナス）%の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。 敵の武器：技術司祭のINTボーナスラウンドで反動が半分増加する。味方の回避率が（1 + INTボーナス）ラウンドの間、+（2 × INTボーナス）%増加する。
languages.original_text: All weapons in a huge area gain additional effects: Allies' Weapons: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced by half for Tech-Priest's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Enemies suffer a −(2 × INT bonus)% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for (1 + INT bonus) rounds. Enemies' Weapons: recoil is increased by half for Tech-Priest's INT bonus rounds. Allies gain +(2 × INT bonus)% increased dodge for (1 + INT bonus) rounds.

traits.locale_text: 広範囲なエリアにあるすべての武器に追加エフェクトが付与される： 味方の武器： 技術司祭の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}反動{/g}が半減する。敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避率{/g}が（1 + INTボーナス）ラウンドの間、−（2 × INTボーナス）%の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。 敵の武器：技術司祭のINTボーナスラウンドで反動が半分増加する。味方の回避率が（1 + INTボーナス）ラウンドの間、+（2 × INTボーナス）%増加する。

広範囲なエリアにあるすべての武器に追加エフェクトが付与される： 味方の武器： 技術司祭の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}反動{/g}が半減する。敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避率{/g}が（1 + INTボーナス）ラウンドの間、−（2 × INTボーナス）%の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。 敵の武器：技術司祭のINTボーナスラウンドで反動が半分増加する。味方の回避率が（1 + INTボーナス）ラウンドの間、+（2 × INTボーナス）%増加する。

Все оружие в обширной области получает дополнительные эффекты: Оружие союзников: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}отдача{/g} уменьшается вдвое на {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}ИНТ{/g} техножреца {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раундов{/g}. Противники получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −(2 × бонус ИНТ)% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} на (1 + бонус ИНТ) раундов. Оружие противников: отдача увеличивается в полтора раза на бонус ИНТ техножреца раундов. Союзники получают +(2 × бонус ИНТ)% к шансу уклонения на (1 + бонус ИНТ) раундов.

languages.text: Alle Waffen in einem riesigen Gebiet erhalten zusätzliche Effekte: Waffen von Verbündeten: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Rückstoß{/g} wird {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Techpriesters {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang um die Hälfte reduziert. Gegner erhalten (1 + INT-Bonus) Runden lang einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −(2 × INT-Bonus) % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}. Waffen von Gegnern: Rückstoß INT-Bonus des Techpriesters Runden lang um die Hälfte erhöht. Verbündete haben (1 + INT-Bonus) Runden lang +(2 × INT-Bonus) % Ausweichen.
languages.original_text: All weapons in a huge area gain additional effects: Allies' Weapons: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced by half for Tech-Priest's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} rounds. Enemies suffer a −(2 × INT bonus)% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for (1 + INT bonus) rounds. Enemies' Weapons: recoil is increased by half for Tech-Priest's INT bonus rounds. Allies gain +(2 × INT bonus)% increased dodge for (1 + INT bonus) rounds.

traits.locale_text: Alle Waffen in einem riesigen Gebiet erlangen zusätzliche Effekte: Verbündeten-Waffen: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Rückstoß{/g} wird um die Hälfte reduziert, und zwar um Techpriester-{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g}. Feinde erleiden einen −(2× INT-Bonus) %-{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g}, und zwar für (1 + INT-Bonus) Runden. Feindwaffen: Rückstoß wird um die Hälfte erhöht, und zwar für Techpriester-INT-Bonus Runden. Das Verbündeten erlangen um +(2× INT-Bonus) % erhöhtes Ausweichen, und zwar für (1 + INT-Bonus) Runden.

languages.text: Toutes les armes situées dans une très large zone bénéficient d'effets supplémentaires : Armes des alliés : le {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recul{/g} est réduit de moitié pendant {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} du technoprêtre rounds. Les ennemis subissent une pénalité d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} de −(2 × bonus d'INT) % pendant (1 + bonus d'INT) rounds. Armes des ennemis : le recul augmente de moitié pendant bonus d'INT du technoprêtre rounds. Les alliés obtiennent un bonus d'esquive de +(2 × bonus d'INT) % pendant (1 + bonus d'INT) rounds.
languages.original_text: All weapons in a huge area gain additional effects: Allies' Weapons: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced by half for Tech-Priest's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} rounds. Enemies suffer a −(2 × INT bonus)% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for (1 + INT bonus) rounds. Enemies' Weapons: recoil is increased by half for Tech-Priest's INT bonus rounds. Allies gain +(2 × INT bonus)% increased dodge for (1 + INT bonus) rounds.

traits.locale_text: Toutes les armes situées dans une très large zone bénéficient d'effets supplémentaires : Armes des alliés : le {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recul{/g} est réduit de moitié pendant {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} du Technoprêtre {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Les ennemis subissent une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} de -(2 × bonus d'INT) % pendant (1 + bonus d'INT) rounds. Armes des ennemis : le recul augmente de moitié pendant bonus d'INT du Technoprêtre rounds. Les alliés reçoivent d'un bonus d'esquive de +(2 × bonus d'INT) % pendant (1 + bonus d'INT) rounds.

languages.text: Geniş bir alandaki tüm silahlar ilave etkiler kazanır: Dost Birimlerin Silahları: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Geri tepme{/g}, Tekno Rahip'in {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}ZEK{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g}nun yarısı kadar azalır. Düşmanlar, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değerlerine −%(2 × ZEK bonusu) kadar ceza puanı alırlar. Bu etki (1 + ZEK bonusu) raunt sürer. Düşmanların Silahları: Geri tepme, Tekno Rahip'in ZEK bonusunun yarısı kadar artar. Dost birimlerin kaçınma değerleri +%(2 × ZEK bonusu) kadar artar. Bu etki (1 + ZEK bonusu) raunt sürer.
languages.original_text: All weapons in a huge area gain additional effects: Allies' Weapons: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced by half for Tech-Priest's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} rounds. Enemies suffer a −(2 × INT bonus)% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for (1 + INT bonus) rounds. Enemies' Weapons: recoil is increased by half for Tech-Priest's INT bonus rounds. Allies gain +(2 × INT bonus)% increased dodge for (1 + INT bonus) rounds.
